title: The Enlightening Adventures of Trent Peterson
summary: Over one week, Trent Peterson discovers his unique abilities to imbue knowledge instantly. He uses these powers to help others learn and overcome challenges.
summaryGerman: Über eine Woche entdeckt Trent Peterson seine einzigartigen Fähigkeiten, Wissen sofort zu vermitteln. Er nutzt diese Kräfte, um anderen beim Lernen und Überwinden von Herausforderungen zu helfen.
summaryDutch: Gedurende een week ontdekt Trent Peterson zijn unieke vaardigheden om onmiddellijk kennis over te brengen. Hij gebruikt deze krachten om anderen te helpen leren en uitdagingen te overwinnen.
summaryFrench: Pendant une semaine, Trent Peterson découvre ses capacités uniques à transmettre instantanément des connaissances. Il utilise ces pouvoirs pour aider les autres à apprendre et à surmonter des défis.

story.text: Trent, while tutoring a struggling student, accidentally discovers his power to instantly transfer understanding of complex topics with a touch.
Excited by his new-found abilities, Trent helps several classmates excel in their studies, feeling a surge of energy.
Word spreads about Trent's abilities. An unknown figure observes him from a distance, setting an eerie tone to the evening.
Trent is approached by a mysterious group interested in his powers for dubious purposes. He declines, determined to use his powers for good.
Trent forms a network of student helpers, inspiring them to spread knowledge and assist others across campus, cultivating a peaceful community.
During a romantic walk, Trent helps his date understand the beauty of the stars through enhanced perception, sharing a magical night.
A major exam is effortlessly passed by many due to Trent's tutoring. The campus celebrates their collective success, ending the week on a high note.

ending: And so, Trent Peterson continued to light the path of knowledge, one touch at a time.
moral: Use your unique talents to uplift and help others.
